text: Lalithadripura is a suburb of Mysore city in Karnataka state of India. ==Location== Lalithadripura is located on the eastern side of Mysore city near the Chamundi Hills. It has a post office and the PIN code is 570027. ==Demographics== There are 4124 people in Lalithadripura village according to 2011 census. ==See also== * Mysore Race Course ==References== Category:Suburbs of Mysore
title: Lalithadripura
